resources.string: You can create a new one or add your existing wallet
Nhập, khôi phục, hoặc chỉ xem
Tạo một ví đa chuỗi mới
Incorrect Seed phrase or Private key or Address. Please try again
Enter seed phrase or private key to import wallet, or address to watch wallet
Xin chúc mừng!\nBạn đã thêm ví %s thành công
Give your wallet a unique name. It can be everything you want, easy to remember
Securely scan WalletConnect or scan QR code to import wallet, access URL on the Browser, etc.
Drag the crop frame to adjust capturing area
Private key detection is performed on your mobile device
